00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include <mfhdf.h>
00021 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00022 
00039 MTKt_status MtkGridAttrGet(
00040   const char *filename,    
00041   const char *gridname,    
00042   const char *attrname,    
00043   MTKt_DataBuffer *attrbuf  )
00044 {
00045   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return code of this function */
00046   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status */
00047   intn hdfstatus;               /* HDF-EOS return status */
00048   int32 fid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS File id */
00049 
00050   if (filename == NULL)
00051     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00052 
00053   fid = GDopen((char*)filename, DFACC_READ);
00054   if (fid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00055 
00056   /* Read grid attribute */
00057   status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, attrname, attrbuf);
00058   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00059 
00060   hdfstatus = GDclose(fid);
00061   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00062 
00063   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00064 ERROR_HANDLE:
00065   if (fid != FAIL) GDclose(fid);
00066   return status_code;
00067 }
00068 
00074 MTKt_status MtkGridAttrGetFid(
00075   int32 fid,               
00076   const char *gridname,    
00077   const char *attrname,    
00078   MTKt_DataBuffer *attrbuf  )
00079 {
00080   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return code of this function */
00081   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status */
00082   intn hdfstatus;               /* HDF-EOS return status */
00083   int32 gid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS Grid id */
00084   int32 hdf_datatype;           /* HDF-EOS data type */
00085   int32 hdf_datasize;       /* HDF-EOS attribute datasize in bytes */
00086   MTKt_DataBuffer attrbuf_tmp = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00087                                 /* Temp attribute buffer */
00088   MTKt_DataType datatype;       /* Mtk data type */
00089 
00090   if (gridname == NULL || 
00091       attrname == NULL || attrbuf == NULL)
00092     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00093 
00094   gid = GDattach(fid, (char*)gridname);
00095   if (gid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDATTACH_FAILED);
00096 
00097   hdfstatus = GDattrinfo(gid, (char*)attrname, &hdf_datatype, &hdf_datasize);
00098   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDATTRINFO_FAILED);
00099 
00100   status = MtkHdfToMtkDataTypeConvert(hdf_datatype, &datatype);
00101   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status);
00102 
00103   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(1, 1, datatype, &attrbuf_tmp);
00104   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status);
00105 
00106   hdfstatus = GDreadattr(gid, (char*)attrname, attrbuf_tmp.dataptr);
00107   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDREADATTR_FAILED);
00108 
00109   hdfstatus = GDdetach(gid);
00110   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDDETACH_FAILED);
00111 
00112   *attrbuf = attrbuf_tmp;
00113 
00114   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00115 ERROR_HANDLE:
00116   if (gid != FAIL) GDdetach(gid);
00117   MtkDataBufferFree(&attrbuf_tmp);
00118   return status_code;
00119 }
